id: THEY. Had A Lot Of Love For Jessie Reyez And Wiz Khalifa On 'TRL'
paragraph:
On the release day of "Broken," their Jessie Reyez collab
        
          Eight days before dropping their collaborative EP Fireside, Dante Jones and Drew Love of THEY. came by TRL's Times Square studio.Recapping their past year to TRL host Sway Calloway, the THEY. guys looked back fondly on hitting the road with folks like Bryson Tiller and PARTYNEXTDOOR, as well as their milestone performance at Coachella. THEY. also revealed plans to collaborate once again with Wiz Khalifa, now that he's working on an R&B album.Dropping "Broken" featuring Jessie Reyez today, THEY. shared what it was like working with Jessie on the track. A friend of Dante's for years, Reyez worked with him on the track before Drew heard it and put his own verse on the song. Hear THEY. describe how they're switching up their style on "Broken" below. TRL airs on weekdays at 8:00am ET.© 2018 Viacom International Inc. All Rights Reserved.
